branchCategory.name: NC(D)GK, High Speed/Precision Cylinder, Non-Rotating, Double Acting, Single Rod
branchCategory.description: Standard NCG double acting non-rotating single rod version. The NCG series is an extremely durable, repairable round body cylinder that provides precision mounting, short overall length, light weight and high speed. &nbsp;Nine mounting styles are available for cylinder mounting flexibility. &nbsp;&nbsp;Bore sizes for the NCG range from 3/4"(20mm) to 2 1/2" (63mm). &nbsp;Standard available stroke lengths from 1" to 12" but with the ability for long strokes. &nbsp;The NCG series is auto-switch capable. &nbsp;&nbsp;
